snippets.title: Database Trigger
snippets.description: Example shows a template for a DB trigger function, which always accepts a changeEvent as an argument.

snippets.title: Scheduled Trigger
snippets.description: Shows an example of a Scheduled Trigger function, which will always call a function without arguments.

snippets.title: General Function
snippets.description: Example of a default function that will get a value and find a document in MongoDB, the parameters passed in the header differ from other templates.

snippets.title: Eventbridge Custom Error Function
snippets.description: Example of a custom error function, which takes in the error and changeEvent as arguments.
